name: Stop CISPA Ribbon
author: Al Lamb

sections.description: A black ribbon with the words “Stop CISPA” will be put on in the top right corner of your website, linking to the Stop CISPA website. You can specify a vertical offset depending on whether the WordPress toolbar is showing. Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon looks. Check out the Help Stop CISPA entry in the BowieRocks.com news too. Thank you for showing your support!
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin zip archive.
  2. Extract it in your wp-content/plugins folder or upload via admin panel.
  3. Browse to your plugins section and active the plugin.
sections.faq:
Q: Why are you doing this?
A: The U.S. Government does not have the best interest of its people in mind any more and now we need to stand against tyranny.

1.0

Copied original “stop acta” and converted it to “stop cispa” – Al @ BowieRocks.com April 18, 2012 Original authors: kovshenin, djvdorp

short_description: Help stop Cyber Intelligence Sharing and Protection Act (CISPA) by putting a ribbon that says Stop CISPA on your WordPress site or network.
description: A black ribbon with the words “Stop CISPA” will be put on in the top right corner of your website, linking to the Stop CISPA website. You can specify a vertical offset depending on whether the WordPress toolbar is showing. Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon looks. Check out the Help Stop CISPA entry in the BowieRocks.com news too. Thank you for showing your support!

screenshots.caption: Here's how the ribbon will appear on your website. Will link to the http://www.avaaz.org/en/stop_cispa/ website.
An example of the new admin menu under tools that display the vertical offset options.
